thread.title: A new team called Footy McFooty Face could be joining MLS - and we're not making this up
thread.title_full: A new team called Footy McFooty Face could be joining MLS - and we're not making this up

author: Jon Moody
title: A new team called Footy McFooty Face could be joining MLS - and we're not making this up
text:
Footy McFooty Face's potential 30,000 capacity home (Photo: http://soccercitysd.com/) Share Get daily   Could   
Cast your minds back to April 2016. 
The world seemed a simpler place, when Leicester(!) weren't champions and your average new polar research ship was being called Boaty McBoatface. 
OK, they ended up calling it something completely different - but it still managed to capture the public's imagination. 
Now, almost a year on, history could be about to repeat itself courtesy of internet comedians over in the US of A. If times had been different, Thierry Henry could have signed for Footy McFooty Face (Photo: Getty) 
Football (sorry, we mean soccer) fans in San Diego have been tasked with naming the city's new potential MLS expansion team via a Facebook knockout poll. 
And, quite brilliantly, Footy McFooty Face is almost leading the charge. 
At the time of writing, the suggestion is just SIX votes away from taking top spot - just behind San Diego Surf (sweet dude!) and in front of San Diego FC (boring) and San Diego Bad Hombres (ABSOLUTELY BRILLIANT). (Photo: Facebook/SoccerCitySD) 
There is actually 50 names in the running which have been whittled down from over 1,000 suggestions - but these are definitely the best. 
The proposed team is part of the Â£800m "Soccer City" plan to create a new sports complex - which includes a 30,000 seat stadium, housing, offices, hotels, shops and green spaces - which former USA international Landon Donovan is part of. "VOTE FOR FOOTY! VOTE FOR FOOTY!" (Photo: Robert Laberge) 
Speaking about the naming process, Donovan said: "There's quite a few names. Mission is one, Athletic San Diego is one, San Diego Surf is a popular one. 
"The fun part is that people actually get to be part of this from day one. [It's] not ownership up here making decisions, it's the people who get to decide this. What the Footy McFooty Face complex could look like (Photo: http://soccercitysd.com/) 
"So we want to be inclusive and we want people to be a part of this." 
And part of this they very much are. If you want to make Footy McFooty Face a reality, you can head over to Soccer City's Facebook page to cast your vote. If this comes off, we think it'd be safe to say we'll all have a new favourite MLS team, eh? poll loading What should Soccer City name their team? 0+ VOTES SO FAR
